p: The tundra of the Changbai Mountains is one of the most typical mountain tundras in Asia [ 23]. The local climate has undergone a significant change over the past 30 years [ 24, 25, 26, 27], including increased temperature during the growing season, increased accumulated temperature, longer growing season [ 28], increased precipitation and increased precipitation intensity [ 27, 29], decreased snowpack, earlier snowmelt, and a shortened snow period [ 30].
